member.name: IO_COUNTERS
member.summary: Contains I/O accounting information for a process or a job object. For a job object, the counters include all operations performed by all processes that have ever been associated with the job, in addition to all processes currently associated with the job.

member.name: IO_COUNTERS.ReadOperationCount
member.summary: The number of read operations performed.

member.name: IO_COUNTERS.WriteOperationCount
member.summary: The number of write operations performed.

member.name: IO_COUNTERS.OtherOperationCount
member.summary: The number of I/O operations performed, other than read and write operations.

member.name: IO_COUNTERS.OtherTransferCount
member.summary: The number of bytes transferred during operations other than read and write operations.
